text: Corner Bakery Cafe is an American chain of cafes. It specialize in pastries, breads, breakfast dishes, gourmet sandwiches, homemade soups, salads, and pasta. It is considered to be a part of the fast casual market segment of the food service industry, offering a somewhat higher quality of food and atmosphere than a typical fast food restaurant, and offering limited table service. Category:American restaurants Category:1991 establishments in the United States
title: Corner Bakery Cafe
